summary: Completed comprehensive e2e testing of Next Step LGBTQIA+ landing page. All features tested and passing: Hero slideshow with 4 images (auto-transition at 6 seconds), clickable slide indicators, bilingual toggle (EN/PT), contact form with validation and MongoDB persistence, WhatsApp and Messenger links correct, navigation scrolls to correct sections.
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes properly implemented for contact form elements
API error handling with proper toast notifications
Form resets correctly after successful submission
seed_data_creation: Created test contact submissions with 'TEST_' prefix during pytest and Playwright tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features verified working: hero slideshow (4 images, 6s auto-transition), slide indicators clickable, language toggle EN/PT, contact form POST/GET /api/contact with MongoDB, WhatsApp link (wa.me/351934229144), Messenger link (m.me/nextstepportugal), navigation scroll to sections

features_tested.hero_slideshow: PASS - 4 images cycle automatically every 6 seconds
features_tested.contact_form_success_toast: PASS - shows 'Thank you! We'll be in touch within 24 hours.'
features_tested.contact_form_validation: PASS - shows 'Please fill in all required fields.'
features_tested.language_toggle: PASS - switches between English and Portuguese
features_tested.navigation_links: PASS - Services, About, Testimonials, Contact all scroll correctly
